com.sk89q.worldedit.util.command.parametric

Class LegacyCommandsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.worldedit.util.command.parametric.AbstractInvokeListener
      • com.sk89q.worldedit.util.command.parametric.LegacyCommandsHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InvokeHandler, InvokeListener

    public class LegacyCommandsHandler
extends AbstractInvokeListener
implements InvokeHandler
    Handles legacy properties on Command such as Command.min() and Command.max().

    • Method Detail

      • createInvokeHandler

        public InvokeHandler createInvokeHandler()
        Description copied from interface: InvokeListener
        Create a new invocation handler.

        An example use of an InvokeHandler would be to verify permissions added by the CommandPermissions annotation.

        For simple InvokeHandler, an object can implement both this interface and InvokeHandler.

        Specified by:
        createInvokeHandler in interface InvokeListener
        Returns:
        a new invocation handler

                       java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                       ParameterData[] parameters,
                       CommandContext context)
                throws CommandException,
                       ParameterException
        Description copied from interface: InvokeHandler
        Called before parameters are processed.
        Specified by:
        preProcess in interface InvokeHandler
        Parameters:
        object - the object
        method - the method
        parameters - the list of parameters
        context - the context
        Throws:
        CommandException - can be thrown for an error, which will stop invocation
        ParameterException - on parameter error
